    public class CaliView.ScaleListener
extends GenericTouchHandler
    Handles zooming and panning events.
    Author:
    Michele Bonazza

      • onPointerDown

        public boolean onPointerDown(PointF adjusted,
                    MotionEvent event)
        Description copied from interface: TouchHandler
        Called when an MotionEvent.ACTION_POINTER_DOWN is detected, that is whenever the second and any following touch event is detected for an action.
        Specified by:
        onPointerDown in interface TouchHandler
        Overrides:
        onPointerDown in class GenericTouchHandler
        Parameters:
        adjusted - the point in canvas coordinates touched by the user
        event - the event that originated this call
        Returns:
        true if the event should be "swallowed" by this method, false if it should be forwarded to other TouchHandler'

      • processTouchEvent

        public boolean processTouchEvent(int action,
                        PointF touched,
                        MotionEvent event)
        Description copied from interface: TouchHandler
        Processes the event labeled with the argument action which took place at the argument point.
        Specified by:
        processTouchEvent in interface TouchHandler
        Overrides:
        processTouchEvent in class GenericTouchHandler
        Parameters:
        action - the result of calling MotionEvent.getAction() on the MotionEvent that generated this call
        touched - the point in canvas coordinates at which the action took place
        event - the event to be processed
        Returns:
        true if this event was handled by this handler
